WARNING: This file is NOT where your settings are stored.
This file is only used to display the settings in the game.
The file you are looking for is 'settings.json' in your saves folder.
If you want to change your settings, edit that file instead.

warriorified names: Use warriors names for the new conditions
IE: use starwalker instead of autism.
vit tint: If enabled, cats' vitiligo will be tinted with their white patch tint(s).
multiple tints: If enabled, cats can spawn with multiple tints that visually stack.
double torties: If enabled, cats can spawn with secondary tortie patches.
dark mode: Camp backgrounds will match with the mode: nighttime for dark mode and daytime for light mode.
fullscreen scaling: If enabled, fullscreen will display as large as possible (toggle fullscreen to update). This may include visual artifacts.
no sprite antialiasing: If enabled, sprites and patrol art will no longer be antialiased ("blurry"/"smooth") when in fullscreen.
custom cursor: The cursor will be replaced with a cat paw. The cursor is currently unfinished and is prone to crashing.
keybinds: Enables certain keybinds to be used throughout the menus for quick navigation.
shaders: This will add a shading layer onto the cat sprites.
gore: Allow mild gore and blood in patrol artwork
Mild gore and blood will be allowed in the artwork displayed alongside patrols.
discord: Discord will show info about your Clan, including your Clan name
check_for_updates: Automatically checks for updates on startup
show_changelog: Shows the changelog of the latest release on startup
special_dates: Certain changes may be made to the game on special days such as April Fools
random relation: Randomize relationship values when creating Clan
Clan founder cats will start the game with established relationships.
they them default: If this setting is on, new cats will generate with they/them pronouns, regardless of gender.

allow_triggers: If this setting is disabled, all other trigger toggles will be ignored. Changing this setting mid-game may cause certain conditions to crash.
misdiagnosis: Allow cats to be incorrectly diagnosed.
When enabled, cats can be given the wrong diagnosis. The correct diagnosis is still visible in the cat's conditions file.
iatrogenic_disorders: Allow cats to have conditions induced by medicical interference.
This toggle requires misdiagnosis to be enabled.
eating_disorders: This toggle enables cats to experience eating disorders
self_harm: Allow content with non-suicidal self harm.
This toggle enables cats to experience self harm. This does not include suicide or attempts.
psychosis: This toggle enables cats to experience psychotic symptoms such as paranoia, delusions, and intense hallucinations.
dissociation: Allow content with dissociation from trauma.
This toggle enables cats to experience dissociation from trauma. This does not include mild dissociative symptoms from attention and memory disorders.
intrusive_thoughts: This toggle enables to experience intrusive thoughts such as depressive hopelessness and homidical ideation.
intrusive_thoughts_TWO_woaw: Allow content with night dirtmaking and nest wetting
This toggle enables cats to experience night dirtmaking (having to get up in the night to use the dirtplace) and nest wetting.
